Cumulative items.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Items: Cumulative items.
By Leon on Thursday, October 16, 2003 - 08:33 pm:

Many moons ago, I posted a question that ran kinda
like this:

"If you got more than one Fire Stone, would the
effect be cumulative"

I was told to try it myself.

I did.

It isn't.

Maybe my game is glitchy (it is second-hand and
GameShark ravaged) but I emptied my items
completely, found a full stock of Fire Stones, and
my monster still wore out at the same rate
as before.

Note: The point I tried this, I had only 10
stones.

Like I said, my game may have just glitched out...

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, October 16, 2003 - 08:41 pm:

Good work. I'd say it's pretty conclusive.

By Leon on Thursday, October 16, 2003 - 08:49 pm:

Thanks.

Unless, as noted, my game is busted.
